name: A World Apart
description:
Welcome To A World Apart!

In Overworld Travel: W/A/S/D to move camera, click to move from node to node
Green Nodes are Resources
Yellow Nodes are dialogue
Red Nodes are Combat

In Combat: 
Click to move
Click on method of attack, then the enemy unit to attack
HP is Red, Armor is Blue
Damage to HP = attack - armor, Damage to Armor = attack
Attack is halved when HP is < Half
NOTE, you can click through UI (unfixed bug), so careful when clicking attack buttons not to accidently move the unit!

Created By:

Ian Yan, Jim Wu, Junhao Wang, Gabriel Castagner
